thread.title: Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki Squash Dating Rumors
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki Squash Dating Rumors

title: Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki Squash Dating Rumors
text:
Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki Squash Dating Rumors Posted just a moment ago 
Sonja Flemming/CBS (LOS ANGELES) -- Kaley Cuoco and her Big Bang Theory co-star Johnny Galecki shut down rumors they're dating again in the wake of her recent split with husband Ryan Sweeting. 
On Wednesday, Cuoco, 29, posted a picture of her and Galecki, 40, bumping fists on Instagram with the caption, "So sorry to disappoint , but no home wreckers or secret flings going on here. Me and @sanctionedjohnnygalecki are just the best of buds- Leonard and Penny will just have to suffice!!!" 
The same day, Gilecki posted a slightly different photo with a similar sentiment: "No scandals / home wreckers / pregnancies here, y'all. Just profound friendship." 
The two, who play on-screen couple Penny and Leonard on the sitcom, dated for almost two years before splitting in 2010. "It was a wonderful relationship, but we never spoke a word about it and never went anywhere together," Cuoco told CBS Watch! magazine in 2010. 
"We were so protective of ourselves and the show and didn't want anything to ruin that," she explained. 
The relationship ended because, "Everyone was always asking, and we deny-deny-denied. … It took a little bit of a toll on me and I think it did for him, too," notes Cuoco. 
Cuoco and Sweeting got engaged in September 2013, and tied the knot that New Year's Eve. They announced their breakup in September. 
Galecki split from actress Kelli Garner in August after more than two years together.
